DATABASE_URL.notes: Postgres DSN required for backend services and ingestion

ACRIS_CSV_PATH.notes: Optional override for local ACRIS seed ingest

DOB_PERMITS_CSV_PATH.notes: Optional path for DOB permits seed ingest

DOB_VIOLATIONS_CSV_PATH.notes: Optional path for DOB violations seed ingest

ZONING_CSV_PATH.notes: Optional path for zoning seed ingest

PLUTO_URL.notes: Download URL for citywide MapPLUTO ZIP

USE_BBL_AS_PK.notes: Toggle to treat BBL as primary key during PLUTO ingest

NYC_SOCRATA_APP_TOKEN.notes: Socrata app token for rate-limited datasets

POLITE_MIN_SLEEP_MS.notes: Lower bound for ingestion politeness delay

POLITE_MAX_SLEEP_MS.notes: Upper bound for ingestion politeness delay

DOB_PERMITS_RESOURCE_ID.notes: Socrata resource id for DOB permits datasets

PERMITS_DATE_FIELD.notes: Override date field for permits ingest

DOB_VIOL_RESOURCE_ID.notes: Socrata resource id for DOB violations

DOB_VIOL_DATE_FIELD.notes: Date field override for DOB violations ingest

HPD_VIOL_DATE_FIELD.notes: Date field override for HPD violations

HPD_REG_DATE_FIELD.notes: Date field override for HPD registrations

ACRIS_LEGAL_DATE_FIELD.notes: Date field override for ACRIS legal ingest

ACRIS_MTG_DATE_FIELD.notes: Date field override for ACRIS mortgage ingest
